readable.title: 3110649716_c17e14670e
readable.content: A man helps another man tie a red ribbon onto his arm . A man helps tie a red ribbon around another man 's right arm during a street parade . A man is tying a red arm band around another mans arm in the street . One man helps another attach a red ribbon to his forearm in the midst of a large group of people . Two men stand together ; one is putting something red on his arm .
